original_title: Jimi Hendrix: Hear My Train a Comin'
overview: An account of the short life of genius musician Jimi Hendrix (1942-70), probably the most talented and influential guitarist of the twentieth century: his humble beginnings in Seattle, his time in New York, his rise to fame in swinging Londonâ€¦ Live fast, love hard, die young.
title: Jimi Hendrix: Hear My Train a Comin'
